City Manager

City Manager David Parsons Port Aransas City Hall 710 West Avenue A City Hall: 361-749-4111 davidparsons@cityofportaransas.org

Message from the City Manager

On behalf of the Mayor, City Council, and the City Hall Team, please accept our most sincere welcome to the City of Port Aransas website. Our goal is to provide the most comprehensive information about our wonderful City in a user friendly format. The City of Port Aransas is a highly desirable coastal destination located on Mustang Island within close proximity to the City of Corpus Christi. Visitors, as well as full-time residents experience wide, clean beaches, premier offshore and nearshore fishing, and bay/flats fishing, fabulous birding and shelling opportunities, and a 1,200 acre nature preserve. Moreover, a variety of beach related activities are available. Again, welcome to the City of Port Aransas. If we can be of service please do not hesitate to contact us. Enjoy your stay in a true Texas style. Hope to see you soon! David Parsons
